TEXT.TITLE: BELL AND HOWELL <BHW> COMPLETES SALE OF UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Bell and Howell Co said it completed the sale of its computer output microfilm business to COM Products Inc, a unit of privately-held <LeBow Industries Inc>. The sum of the deal was not disclosed. The unit makes a device that prints data directly from a computer onto microfilm. Reuter
